product_name: The North Face Sanctuary Jacket - Women's
long_description: Cover up your form-fitting yoga apparel on the way to the studio and stay warmer in the densely-knit, wind-resistant Sanctuary jacket from The North Face. The flattering construction protects the shoulders with durable polyester and defines your waist with a stretch knit body. Full length zipper and drawcord hood seal in warmth, and fabric panels feature partially recycled fabric. The North Face Sanctuary jacket features zippered hand pockets that work with your media player.
short_description: Cover up your form-fitting yoga apparel on the way to the studio and stay warmer in the densely-knit, wind-resistant Sanctuary jacket from The North Face.
